駕.definition: to harness; to draw (a cart etc); to drive; to pilot; to sail; to ride; your good self; prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辭|敬辞[jing4 ci2])

駕乘.definition: to drive (a car); to fly (an aircraft); to pilot (a boat)

駕培.definition: driver training (abbr. for 駕駛培訓|驾驶培训[jia4 shi3 pei2 xun4])

駕御.definition: variant of 駕馭|驾驭[jia4 yu4]

駕校.definition: driving school; abbr. for 駕駛學校|驾驶学校

駕照.definition: driver's license (abbr. for 駕駛執照|驾驶执照[jia4shi3 zhi2zhao4])

駕臨.definition: to grace sb with one's presence; your arrival (honorific); your esteemed presence

駕艇.definition: to sail; to cruise; to pilot a ship

駕輕就熟.definition: lit. an easy drive on a familiar path (idiom); fig. experience makes progress easy; a task that is so familiar one can do it with one's hand tied behind one's back

駕轅.definition: to pull a carriage (of draft animal)

駕雲.definition: to ride the clouds; fig. self-satisfied; arrogant

駕馭.definition: to urge on (of horse); to drive; to steer; to handle; to manage; to master; to dominate

駕駛.definition: to drive (vehicle); to pilot (ship, airplane etc); driver; pilot; captain

駕駛室.definition: cab (of a locomotive, truck etc); driver's compartment; wheelhouse

駕鶴成仙.definition: to fly on a crane and become immortal

駕鶴西去.definition: lit. to fly on a crane to the Western Paradise; fig. to pass away (idiom)

駕鶴西歸.definition: see 駕鶴西去|驾鹤西去[jia4 he4 xi1 qu4]

駕鶴西遊.definition: see 駕鶴西去|驾鹤西去[jia4 he4 xi1 qu4]

駕齡.definition: length of experience as a driver
